image.title: National Geographic Society and the Nature Conservancy

item.title: Drops of Hope: Ethiopia's Water Scarcity Challenge
item.description: This story map takes you on a journey to the Northern Shewa region, specifically Wuchale and Jidda Woreda, to understand the depths of this crisis, its local impact on the lives of women and children, the efforts of stakeholders to find solutions, and the lessons we can learn from their struggles.
